definition: finely chopped meat or vegetables/powdered or fragmentary
powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink

sentences.english: He breaketh in pieces the strong together with the weak for He regardeth not any man.
sentences.chinese: 他把强者与弱者一同化为齑粉，因为他目中无人。

definition: to destroy in an explosion/to break (by bombing)
to rupture/to burst open/to break up
to disintegrate/to shatter into small pieces
lit. scattered ashes and dispersed smoke (idiom)/fig. to be annihilated/to vanish in a puff of smoke
lit. torn body and crushed bones (idiom)/fig. to die horribly/to sacrifice one's life
all split up and in pieces (idiom); disunity (in an organization)/complete lack of unity/to disintegrate/falling apart/to be at sixes and sevens
rain of blood/heavy rain colored by loess sandstorm
